summary: Client requested Sarah to start a requirements meeting. The PM asked for the project name, while the Architect, Developer, and QA provided no comments (not_addressed).

actions.task: Start the requirements meeting and prepare initial agenda and project name suggestions
Solicit project name suggestions and requirements input from Architect, Developer, and QA prior to the meeting

backlog_deltas.title: Add backlog item to define and agree on project name and naming criteria

risks.risk: Key technical and QA stakeholders did not provide input (architect, developer, QA not_addressed), risking incomplete requirements and delays.
risks.mitigation: Schedule follow-up meeting, assign explicit owners and deadlines for input, and collect written feedback prior to requirements meeting.
